sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_963452181b61bd10f54b5201604bcb33
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.clpHIMext</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>Implements extension point x_tygr_check.ExtensionRunner
Checklist Pro extension points for create/edit/close  condition which customers may invoke their scripts for determining when a Checklist should be created, is editable and/or is associated with a record that is considered closed.</description><name>clpHIMext</name><script><![CDATA[var clpHIMext = Class.create();
clpHIMext.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},

    clpCreate: function( /* GlideRecord object */ rec, /* x_tygr_check configuration record */ config) {
        // return true if a checklist should be created for <rec>, otherwise return false
    },

    clpEdit: function( /* GlideRecord object */ rec, /* x_tygr_check configuration record */ config) {
        // return true if the checklist for <rec> should be editable, otherwise return false
    },

    clpClosed: function( /* GlideRecord object */ rec, /* x_tygr_check configuration record */ config) {
        // return true if the <rec> is to be considered "closed", 
        // otherwise return false indicating <rec> is NOT "closed"
        var result = false;
        if (config.active == true && config.name == "Hardware Inventory Management" &&
            rec.state != 'In-Progress' &&
            rec.approval == true && global.JSUtil.notNil(rec.assigned_to) &&
            (rec.short_description + '').indexOf('Hardware Inventory Management:') == 0) {
            result = true;
            if (rec.state == 'Closed Incomplete') {
                gs.info('clpHIMext.clpClosed state=Closed Incomplete: ' + rec.assigned_to.getDisplayValue());
                return result;
            }
        }

        var added = new x_tygr_check.CLP().getValue(rec.sys_id.toString(), 'New Hardware');


        return result;
    },

    clpShared: function( /* GlideRecord object */ rec, /* x_tygr_check configuration record */ config) {
        // For clpShared, this "config" parameter will be the checklist where "Type='References Shared Checklist'".
        // As an example, suppose we've declared a shared checklist for the SC_TASK table and the shared checklist
        // table references the SC_REQ_ITEM table.  There will be a checklist configuration 
        // (with template values) for the SC_REQ_ITEM table, but "rec" will be the SC_TASK record and 
        // "config" will be the checklist configuration for the SC_TASK record, and it will refer to the
        // SC_REQ_ITEM checklist via "config.shared_checklist"
        // 
        // This way the extension point builder knows what we refer to as the "source" record (i.e. the SC_TASK)
        // record and it's CLP configuration record and can also get to the actual shared checklist configuration
        // (which will have the template to be used)
        //
        // ---Important----
        // Following the above example, this extension point function should return the sys_id of the 
        // SC_REQ_ITEM record that is to be related to the specified "rec" SC_TASK record.
        //
        // return '' if no shared record can be found.

    },

    clpPortalSummary: function( /* x_tygr_check configuration record */ config) {
        // return an array of sys_ids of the records from the Checklist Pro Configuration table that are to 
        // be considered for displaying in the Checklist Pro Summary widget.  
        // These sys_ids should be returned as an array from this function and they will be shown in the 
        // clp widget and the Checklist Pro Summary widget will select data from the
        // Checklist Item (x_tygr_check_item) table that reference the sys_ids in this array.
        var arr = [];
        var gr = new GlideRecord(config.table);
        // Add custom logic here...

        return arr;
    },

    clpShowButton: function( /* GlideRecord object */ rec, /* x_tygr_check configuration record */ config) {
        // return true if a button (for customizable processing) should appear at the end of the checklist,
        // otherwise return false
        return (gs.getUserID() == rec.assigned_to && rec.state == 'In-Progress');
    },

    clpButtonClicked: function( /* GlideRecord object */ rec, /* x_tygr_check configuration record */ config) {
        // if the Checklist Pro button is exists and is clicked, this customizable callback will be invoked
        // The function should return an CLP response object structured as follows:
        // {
        //    code:    <integer>,
        //    message: <string>
        // }
        // where Checklist Pro will handle code values as follows:
        // 0: do nothing
        // 1: trigger a reload and re-evaluation of the checklist against the record
        // 2: trigger a reload and re-evaluation of the checklist against the record and...
        //    popup and alert with the contents of the message attribute in the response displayed in the alert
        // all other numbers for release v1.4 shall be treated as code value of 0
        var clpResponse = {
            code: 0,
            message: ""
        };

        // Add custom logic here...
        var item = new GlideRecord('x_tygr_check_item');
        // get the New Name value.
        var hardware = new GlideRecord('alm_hardware');
        var new_hardware = new x_tygr_check.CLP().getValue(rec.sys_id.toString(), 'New Hardware');
        if (new_hardware.status == 'found' && hardware.get(new_hardware.value + '')) {
            item.addEncodedQuery('order<1000^template.type=Checkbox^document=' + rec.sys_id + '^ORDEBBYDESCorder');
            item.setLimit(1);
            item.query();
            if (item.next()) {
                item.order += 1;
                item.name = hardware.getDisplayValue();
                item.complete = true;
                item.insert();

                clpResponse.code = 2;
                clpResponse.message = item.name + ' added to the list of hardware for ' +
                    rec.assigned_to.getDisplayValue();
            } else {
                var temp = new GlideRecord('x_tygr_check_template');
                temp.addEncodedQuery('item=Hardware^config.name=' + config.name);
                temp.query();
                if (temp.next()) {
                    item = new GlideRecord('x_tygr_check_item');
                    item.document = rec.sys_id;
                    item.checklist = config.sys_id;
                    item.template = temp.sys_id;
                    item.order = 1;
                    item.name = hardware.getDisplayValue();
                    item.complete = true;
                    item.insert();

                    clpResponse.code = 2;
                    clpResponse.message = item.name + ' added to the list of hardware for ' + rec.assigned_to.getDisplayValue();
                } else {
                    clpResponse.code = 2;
                    clpResponse.message = 'Contact Checklist Pro Admin. Hardware Inventory Management template config missing "Hardware"';
                }
            }

            gs.info('clpHIMext().clpButtonClicked: about to update checklist vars.');

            var added = new GlideRecord('x_tygr_check_item');
            added.addEncodedQuery('document=' + rec.sys_id + '^template.item=Added');
            added.query();
            if (added.next()) {
                added.integer += 1;
                gs.info('clpHIMext().clpButtonClicked: updating "Added": ' + added.integer);

                added.update();
            } else {
                gs.info('clpHIMext().clpButtonClicked: could not find "Added" checklist item.');
            }
            added.initialize();
            added.addEncodedQuery('document=' + rec.sys_id + '^template.item=Added Values');
            added.query();
            if (added.next()) {
                added.string = added.string + '\n' + hardware.getDisplayValue();
                gs.info('clpHIMext().clpButtonClicked: updating "Added Values"\n' + added.string);

                added.update();
            } else {
                gs.info('clpHIMext().clpButtonClicked: could not find "Added Values" checklist item.');
            }
        } else {
            clpResponse.code = 2;
            clpResponse.message = 'Select a Hardware item to add in the "New Hardware" item, then click the "Add Hardware" button';
        }

        return clpResponse;
    },

    type: 'clpHIMext'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>ty.roach</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-09-24 03:16:47</sys_created_on><sys_id>963452181b61bd10f54b5201604bcb33</sys_id><sys_mod_count>10</sys_mod_count><sys_name>clpHIMext</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_963452181b61bd10f54b5201604bcb33</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>ty.roach</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-09-26 21:20:30</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
